body:
$!

Appeal to the transport tribunal if you disagree with a decision that the approved driving instructor (ADI) registrar has made about your registration. 

$!

You can appeal against the ADI registrar’s decision to:

- refuse to enter or keep your name on the register
- remove your name from the register
- refuse to give you a trainee licence
- remove your trainee licence
- refuse to extend your trainee licence
- refuse you compensation if you were suspended as an ADI

##How to appeal

You must appeal within a set time of getting the decision notice. The time limit is:

- 14 days if you're a trainee instructor appealing about a registration decision
- 28 days if you're an ADI appealing about a registration decision
- 28 days if you're appealing about a compensation claim 

$D [Download 'T94 - Appealing to the First-tier Tribunal (Transport)' (PDF, 207KB)](http://www.justice.gov.uk/downloads/forms/tribunals/transport/t94.pdf "Download 'T94 - Appealing to the First-tier Tribunal (Transport)' (PDF, 207KB)"){:rel="external"}  $D

###Notice of appeal form
To appeal, download the appeal form and send it to the transport tribunal.

$D [Download 'DSA 1 - First-tier Tribunal (Transport) notice of appeal' (PDF, 67KB)](http://www.justice.gov.uk/downloads/forms/tribunals/transport/dsa-1-transport-appeal-form.pdf "DSA 1 - First-tier Tribunal (Transport) notice of appeal' (PDF, 67KB)"){:rel="external"}  $D

$D [Download 'Guidance notes for appellants - completing form DSA 1' (PDF, 59KB)](http://www.justice.gov.uk/downloads/forms/tribunals/transport/dsa-1-transport-appeal-guidance.pdf "Guidance notes for completing form DSA 1 (PDF, 59KB)"){:rel="external"}  $D

$A

The First-tier Tribunal (Transport) 
7th Floor
Victory House
30-34 Kingsway
London
WC2B 6EX

$A

^ There's a different process to [appeal against an ADI registration decision](http://www.dvtani.gov.uk/adi/adiregistration.asp "Appeal against an ADI registration decision"){:rel="external"} in Northern Ireland. ^

*[ADI]: Approved driving instructor

title: Appeal a driving instructor registration decision
